entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@GOPChairwoman @carlquintanilla @realDonaldTrump Are we better off after 3.5 years of trump squatting in our WH? 
Absolutely NOT! 
Billionaires are richer, thousands wait in food lines, lost their jobs, healthcare and lives because of him ignoring warnings about #COVID19. 
Trump didn't create new jobs. 
#TRUMPRUINSEVERYTHING
